ListApartment.title: Apartment Information
ListApartment.ad-title-desc: Ad title up to a maximum of 100 characters.
ListApartment.ad-title-placeholder: Beautiful studio apartment in the city centre
ListApartment.offering-type-desc: Please choose how this apartment will be listed. Multiple options are allowed.
ListApartment.location-desc: Please select the location of the apartment by moving the map until the pointer points to the correct location. You may also search for the location.
ListApartment.area-desc: Apartment area expressed in square meter (m²).
ListApartment.images-desc: Please upload at least one image of the apartment. Maximum allowed file size is 10MB.
ListApartment.short-term-price-description: Price of the apartment per night in €.
ListApartment.long-term-price-description: Price of the monthly rent in €.
ListApartment.sale-description-description: Description to be shown on the apartment sale page.
ListApartment.short-term-rent-description: Description to be shown on the apartment short term rent page.
ListApartment.long-term-rent-description: Description to be shown on the apartment long term rent page.
ListApartment.bedroom-count-description: Total number of bedrooms in the apartment
ListApartment.bathroom-count-description: Total number of bathrooms in the apartment
ListApartment.parking-count-description: Number of parking spaces which belong to the apartment
ListApartment.contact-description: Choose members from your company which will be listed as contacts for this listing.

CompanyPage.click-here: Click here to create a new company.
CompanyPage.name: Company Name
CompanyPage.members-description: Company members. All members can be listed as contacts when creating a new listing. Registered members can also submit new listings.
CompanyPage.invite-member-description: If the member has an open Imovinko account, enter their e-mail or username to invite them into the company.
CompanyPage.manual-member-description: Manually enter information about a member. This member can then be listed as a contact when submitting a new ad.
CompanyPage.registered-users-2: icon next to their names are registered members.
CompanyPage.success-message: User will recieve notification about the company invite.

CreateCompanyPage.title: Company Information
CreateCompanyPage.name-description: Company name. Please note that this value can not be changed later.
CreateCompanyPage.pin-description: Company Personal Identification Number. Please note that this value can not be changed later.
CreateCompanyPage.web-page-description: If the company has its own website, please fill in the full link to the website here.
CreateCompanyPage.store-name-description: Name of the store which will be shown on company listings. If this field is left empty, the name of the company will be shown instead

Notifications.invited-you: has invited you to join the company as a member
